longInfo:
Passport required.
- Passports and other documents accepted for entry must be
  valid for the period of intended stay. 
 - Passports and other documents accepted for entry issued to
   residents of Turks and Caicos Isl. must be valid on
   arrival. 
- British passports endorsed  British Citizen  that have been
  extended 12 months by an extension stamp contained within
  the passport are accepted.

Visa required, except for Holders of British passports
endorsed  British Overseas Territories Citizen  issued by
Turks and Caicos Isl.
Visa required, except for Holders of British passports
endorsed  British Citizen  also holding a National Turks and
Caicos Islands Status Card or expired  British Overseas
Territories Citizen  passport issued by Turks and Caicos Isl. 
Visa required, except for A max. stay of 90 days: 
 - for holders of British passports endorsed  British Overseas
   Territories Citizen , issued by 
 - for holders of British passports endorsed  British
   Citizen ;
 - for holders of British passports endorsed  British National
   (Overseas) ,  British Overseas Citizen  or  British
   Protected Person"; 
Additional Information:
- Visitors are required to hold proof of sufficient funds to
  cover their stay and documents required for their next
  destination.
- Extension of stay possible for visa exempt visitors. 
Warning:
- Visitors not holding return/onward tickets  co
  uld be refused entry.



 Turks and Caicos Isl
